issue.title: [CF 1248] Lua - Error on Login
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Log on a character

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

``` 10x ...\Components\IconTypes\IconType_cooldown\cooldown.lua:295: attempt to index field 'HELP' (a nil value) ...\Components\IconTypes\IconType_cooldown\cooldown.lua:295: in function <...\Components\IconTypes\IconType_cooldown\cooldown.lua:288> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[2]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:915: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:806> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5> (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group-Group.lua:496: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Group.lua:424> (tail call): ? ... (tail call): ? TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.1.0.lua:2644: in function `UpdateNormally' TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.1.0.lua:2776: in function `Update' TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-8.1.0.lua:1160: in function `?' ...Ons\Ace3\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0-6.lua:145: in function <...Ons\Ace3\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:145> [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4> [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?' ...Ons\Ace3\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0-6.lua:90: in function `Fire' Ace3\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0-3.lua:120: in function <Ace3\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119> Locals: nil ```

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.1.0


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura | Imported from CurseForge issue #1248 | Raw
